q: What type of company are you?

choices.text: We are a head hunter, I want to match you to a client
We are a software development house developing software for other company
We are a company developing software for consumer
We are a company developing software for in house use

q: How important is English to you?

choices.text: Critical, we need to communicate with client or co worker in English speaking country
Essential, we need it extensive for our product search and development
All code, document and communication must be in Chinese
